name: HISTORIC TAX CREDIT COALITION
sampleDescriptions: Monitor legislation affecting Historic Tax Credits, Section 47 IRC.
Monitor legislation, rules, and guidance affecting the Historic Tax Credit, Section 47 iRC.  Monitor issues as the pertain the the implementation of tax reform.  Advocate for an improved credit.
